messages.content: What is the purpose of ComfyUI-Live2DViewer?
ComfyUI-Live2DViewer is a comfyui node for viewing Live2D models.
Where should you place your Live2D model to use ComfyUI-Live2DViewer?
To use ComfyUI-Live2DViewer, you should put your Live2D model in the 'ComfyUI-Live2DViewer/web/vtuber' file path.
What is the structure of the 'vtuber' directory in ComfyUI-Live2DViewer?
The 'vtuber' directory in ComfyUI-Live2DViewer should contain the Live2D model files, with the runtime folder and other necessary files like .can3 and .cmo3 files.
Where can you find sample Live2D models?
You can find sample Live2D models at https://www.live2d.com/zh-CHS/learn/sample/.
Is there a tutorial or demo available for ComfyUI-Live2DViewer?
Yes, there is a tutorial or demo available for ComfyUI-Live2DViewer, but the link is not provided in the given content.
What resources are available for support and donation for ComfyUI-Live2DViewer?
ComfyUI-Live2DViewer provides a WeChat group for support and a donation option, with QR codes for both.
Which project is credited in the 'Thanks' section of ComfyUI-Live2DViewer's documentation?
The project credited in the 'Thanks' section of ComfyUI-Live2DViewer's documentation is live2d-TTS-LLM-GPT-SoVITS-Vtuber.
